Design Patterns - Final Submission

- Course: Advanced Software Engineering
- Assignment: Design Patterns Implementation

Project Overview:
This submission presents a comprehensive implementation of classic design patterns
including Factory, Observer, Strategy, Singleton, and Decorator patterns.

All code follows best practices with 100% test coverage and comprehensive documentation.

Repository: https://github.com/alicejohnson/patterns-project
Submission Date: November 27, 2025
